attributes.action: Save the jobs at equiniti worthing west sussex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Job Losses have been announced at Equiniti Worthing. Their jobs are to be out sourced to India. Please support the workers, and sign this petition to let Mr.Brown know that this practice of outsourcing our banking and investment companies  abroad is wrong because of the danger of identity theft. Equiniti deal with share certificates.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
